concept.title: Introduction
concept.shortdesc: Welcome to Atom for the Beginner: Quick Set-Up

conbody.p: Anyone new to reading and writing computer programming source code should use a text editor with beginner-friendly features. The essential features for beginners are syntax highlighting and live preview.

This guide contains:
Step-by-step instructions to:
Download Atom for your operating system
Set up and use syntax highlighting for HTML, Markdown, and RST
Set up and use live preview for HTML, Markdown, and RST
An explanation of Atom packages
Basic Syntax Comparison of HTML, Markdown, and RST
Links to Additional Online Syntax Cheatsheets The basic skills you learn here can be applied to other languages and features in Atom.
